attributes.action: Let office and non-desk based staff at Parliament work from home
attributes.additional_details: To limit the spread of the Coronavirus. To protect individuals. To keep the parliamentary staff and the public safe and not exposed to those who are unwell.
attributes.background: I want the Government to debate about allowing staff working in offices and those exposed to the public within parliament to work from home ASAP. The government also needs to enable managers to permit individuals who work in other organisations to work from home to limit the spread of the virus.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the requested action has been taken

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
